title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Personal Learning Environment (PLE) Design Project for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select and design PLE components (tools, communities, resources) based on educational goal analysis
Learners can integrate learner control principles and educational effectiveness principles to propose implementation strategies in PLE design
Learners can improve PLE prototypes through peer evaluation and feedback processes in project-based activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
